subject: Mathematics
question_en: A train covers a distance of 100 km in 2 hours at a constant speed. What is its speed?
question_hi: एक टेरेन 100 किमी को सुन्नून 2 घंटे की ताजीवी से पूरी दूरी को कितने किमी?
explanation_en: According to the given information, the train travels at a speed of 40 kmph.
explanation_ar: وفقًا للمعلومات المعطاة, سرعة القطار هي 40 كم/ساعة.
